org.codehaus.preon.binding
Interface Binding

public interface Binding

The interface of objects that are able to load object state from a BitBuffer and store object state into a BitBuffer. Note the difference with a Codec. A Codec is capable of creating new objects. Bindings are expected to unload their data into an existing object.

The Binding abstraction is key to the inner workings of the ObjectCodecFactory. The reason why it is a public interface instead of an internal one is to allow you to plugin in other kinds of Binding. The typical example here is the ConditionalBindingFactory. This BindingFactory creates Binding instances that respect conditions set as annotations on Fields.

Author:
Wilfred Springer

Method Detail

load

void load(Object object,
          BitBuffer buffer,
          Resolver resolver,
          Builder builder)
          throws DecodingException
Loads a value from the BitBuffer and uses the value to populate a field on the object.

Parameters:
object - The Object on which fields need to be populated.
buffer - The buffer from which data will be taken.
resolver - The object capable of returning values for references passed in.
builder - The builder that will be used when - while loading data from the BitBuffer - the Binding is (indirectly) required to create a default instance of a type.
Throws:
DecodingException - If we fail to decode the fields value from the BitBuffer.

describe

<V extends nl.flotsam.pecia.SimpleContents<?>> V describe(V contents)
Describes this Binding in the paragraph passed in.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the container for this paragraph.
V - The paragraph in which the content has been written.
Parameters:
contents - The paragraph in which content will be written.
resolver - The object capable of rendering references in a human-readable way.
Returns:
The same object as passed in.

<T,V extends nl.flotsam.pecia.ParaContents<T>> V writeReference(V contents)
Writes a (potentially hyperlinked) reference in the paragraph passed in.

getId

String getId()
Returns a unique identifier for this binding. (Guaranteed to be unique for the Codec created.) Note that decorators are expected to leave this id untouched.

Returns:
A unique identifier for this binding.

save

void save(Object value,
          BitChannel channel,
          Resolver resolver)
          throws IOException
Saves the state of the bound value to the BitChannel passed in.

Parameters:
value - The value to be stored.
channel - The channel receiving the encoded representation.
resolver - The resolver, used to resolve variable references.
Throws:
IOException
